name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap Moments and Notifications on Twitter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension undoes the horrible change twitter made to have the notifications link appear after moments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why did Twitter decide to change the order of the Notification and Moments buttons? 

Who knows?!

But who cares. Installing this extension reverts them to the old order and restores your sanity.

Optionally, click the extension icon to hide the Moments button entirely, so you don't accidentally click it and find out what it does.
